sentences.sContent: He came to this country 20 years ago and is the archetype of the successful Asian businessman.
sentences.sCn: 他20年前来到这个国家，是成功的亚裔商人的典型。

remMethod.val: arch(旧的) + e + typ (模型， 印象) + e → 原型

trans.tranOther: a perfect example of something, because it has all the most important qualities of things that belong to that type
